summary: A question paper generation system (formerly 'Exam Craft') with features including a question bank, CSV reference template, and automatic question paper generation.

existing_features.title: On the Login/welcome page (frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx), update any displayed app name or branding text that reads 'Exam Craft' to 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System'.

new_feature_requests.summary: Change app name from 'Exam Craft' to 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System' on welcome page
Allow edit and delete subject in question bank section

In the Question Bank page (frontend/src/pages/QuestionBank.tsx), within the Subjects tab, render each subject entry with an Edit button and a Delete button. Clicking Edit should open an edit dialog (reuse or extend SubjectManager's edit dialog) pre-filled with the subject's current name. Clicking Delete should prompt for confirmation and then delete the subject via the existing delete mutation in useQueries.ts.
